Code: EXEC SQL SELECT NUM_APOLICE, RAMOFR, MODALIFR, CODCORR, CODSUBES, DTINIVIG, DTTERVIG, PCPARCOR, PCCOMCOR, TIPCOM, INDCRT, COD_EMPRESA, DTINIVIG + 01 YEAR, DTINIVIG - 01 DAY FROM seguros.v1apolcorret WHERE NUM_APOLICE = :NUM_APOLICE AND CODSUBES = :CODSUBES AND (DTTERVIG = :DTTERVIG OR DTTERVIG = '9999-12-31') ORDER BY 7 DESC, CODCORR, RAMOFR END SQL
